title: Story Writing
description: Use your imagination to create and continue stories!

prompts.input: Finish this story: 'One sunny morning, a little squirrel found a shiny key on the ground. The squirrel picked it up and...' What happens next? Use your imagination!
Create a short story about a child who finds a friendly robot in their backyard. What does the robot look like? What do they do together?
hints: Describe what the robot looks like
Think about what makes them become friends
